'''"Tlalocan's Drawing"''' is a [[Furnishing]] item that can be used in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

The blueprint for "Tlalocan's Drawing" is obtainable from [[Realm Depot]] for {{Item|Realm Currency|30|x=160}}.

==Creation==
First time creation grants {{Item|Trust|24|x=60}}.
{{Recipe
|type = Creation
|time = 14h
|Ashen Aratiku Wood = 4
|Red Dye = 2
|Yellow Dye = 2
|sort = Ashen Aratiku Wood;Red Dye;Yellow Dye
}}
